metadata.title: CVE-2024-1305 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: tap-windows6 driver version 9.26 and earlier does not properlycheck the size data of incomming write operations which an attacker canuse to overflow memory buffers, resulting in a bug check and potentially arbitrary code execution in kernel space

criterions.comment: openvpn package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
